item.title: CVE-2023-3481|2023-08-21T10:04:23.880Z -- google%20chrome%20labs -- critters
item.description: Critters versions 0.0.17-0.0.19 have an issue when parsing the HTML, which leads to a potential cross-site scripting (XSS) bug. We recommend upgrading to version 0.0.20 of the extension.Â
